meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Tolany Sharon Warner Nolan Martch Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6691.

td.p: Bill Tolany, a marketing executive from Austin, Texas
Sharon Warner, a retired teacher and writer from Chicago, Illinois
Nolan Martch, a construction foreman from Homewood, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,000)

tr.td: INTO THIN AIR
BEERS TO YOU!
ALSO A ZODIAC SIGN
WELL, I'M WARM-BLOODED
CHECK IT & SEE

Nolan
')
